AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_PHB_PROFILE_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: ingress qos profile to context selection profile

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_REMARK_PROFILE_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: ingress remark qos profile to context selection profile

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_ECN_PROFILE_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: ingress qos ECN profile to context selection profile

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_PHB_PROFILE_TO_INTERNAL_MAP_ID
AppDB.OneLineDescription: PHB qos profile to internal map id

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_REMARK_PROFILE_TO_INTER_MAP_ID
AppDB.OneLineDescription: REMARKING qos profile to internal map id

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_ECN_PROFILE_TO_INTERNAL_MAP_ID
AppDB.OneLineDescription: ECN qos profile to internal map id

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_PHB_INTERNAL_MAP_ENTRIES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: internal map key to tc dp

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_REMARK_INTERNAL_MAP_ENTRIES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: internal map key to tc dp

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_ECN_INTERNAL_MAP_ENTRIES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: internal map key to tc dp

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_INIT_CONTEXT_SELECTION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: phb/remark context selection cam

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_IVE_INITIAL_PCP_DEI_MAP_TYPE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Ingress VLAN PCP DEI initial type, 1 means explict

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_INIT_TTL_CONTEXT_SELECTION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: TTL context selection cam

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_IVE_PCP_DEI_EXPLICIT_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: PCP-DEI explicit mapping Table. Table is accessed with Address7:2 where: Address = PCP-DEI-Map-Profile3:0 Incoming-Tag.PCP-DEI(4). Each entry contains 4 New-PCP-DEI_n, n = Address1:0

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_IVE_UNTAG_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: PCP-DEI mapping Table. Table is accessed with Address9:0 where: Address = PCP-DEI-Map-Profile3:0, 1b0, tc2:0,dp1:0 Each entry contains 4 New-PCP-DEI_n, n = Address9:8 the key "PADDING" MUST be 0

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_PROPAG_PROFILE_MAPPING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map Propagation-Profile to PHB/Remark/Ecn/TTL strength, map to 2 HW tables IPPA and IPPF

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_TTL_DECREMENT_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: TTL decrement enable disable Indicates whether the TTL decrement should occur or not. 1 - decrement TTL by 1 0 - do not decrement

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_NETWORK_QOS_PIPE_PROFILE_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map Nwk-QoS-Idx(6b) to Pipe-Mapped-QoS_DP(10b), Pipe-Nwk-QoS-Var-O2(8b)

Field.Name: NETWORK_QOS_PIPE
Field.Description: Used when layer is in QOS pipe mode

Field.Name: NETWORK_QOS_PIPE_MAPPED
Field.Description: Used to update network qos of the existed and initial next layer network QOS when the mapping mode is pipe mapped

Field.Name: DP_PIPE_MAPPED
Field.Description: Used to update initial DP of the existed and next layer mappings when working in pipe mapped mode

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_NETWORK_QOS_INITIAL_SELECT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Initial NWK_QOS Selection register Map:Ingress-NWK-Valid(1),NWK-Layer-FWD-Type(3), NWK-Layer-FWD-Plus1-Type(3) To Initial-NWK-QoS-Select-FWD(2)

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_JER_INGRESS_NWK_QOS_MAPPING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map Jericho IN-DSCP-EXP to NWK_QOS:NWK-Layer-FWD-Type(2), In-Dscp-Exp(8) To NWK-QoS(8)

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_TC_NWK_QOS_MAPPING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map TC to NWK_QOS: TC(2) To NWK-QoS(8)

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_NWK_QOS_TYPE_SELECT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map forward code to egress packet type: FWD_CODE(6) To INGRESS_NWK_QOS_TYPE(2)

AppDB.Name: QOS_FWD_LAYER_TYPE_SELECT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map network protocol to egress forward type: LAYER_PROTOCOL(5) To ETPP_QOS_VAR_TYPE(3) and QOS_LAYER_PROTOCOL(3)

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_MODEL_MAPPING_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Variables mapped by QoS-Model(3b), Used by ECN and FWD

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_MAP_TYPE_SELECT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configurations for QoS and DP calculations. Mapping QoS and DP into various properties to be used in procedures

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_PROTOCOL_PROFILE_TO_INTERNAL_MAP_ID
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map QoS-Layer-protocol(3), remark profile(3) to Protocol-Remark-Profile(3)

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_MAPPING_INITIAL_NETWORK_QOS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map Protocol-QoS-Map(3), QoS variable(8) to layer-QoS(8)

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_PCP_DEI_DP_MAPPING_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: PCP-DEI Mapping Table for IVE, maps DP+INLIF_Profile+Selected_PCP_DEI to new PCP-DEI

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_PROFILE_TO_INTERNAL_MAP_ID
AppDB.OneLineDescription: MapQoS-VAR-Map(5), Type(3) to Protocol-QoS-Map(5), OuLIF-RemarkOrKeep(1)

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_FWD_HEADER_REMARK_ENABLER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map type_fwd_remark_or_keep(1b) and qos_inheritance_output_remark_or_keep(1) to the final remark enabler for forwarding header.

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_NETWORK_QOS_MAPPING_PACKET
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map Protocol-QoS-Map(5), QoS_DP(10) to New-QoS-VAR(8) Table is accessed with Address14:4 where: Address = Protocol-QoS-Map(5), QoS_DP(10)", Each entry contains 16 New QOS Variables. New-QOS-Var = NewQosVarDatan*8+:8 where n = Address3:0

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_NETWORK_QOS_MAPPING_NEXT_LAYER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map Remark-Profile.Nwk-Qos-Map(5), QoS_DP(10) to New-QoS_DP(10) Table is accessed with Address14:4 where: Address = Remark-Profile.Nwk-Qos-Map(5), QoS_DP(10), Each entry contains 16 New QOS Variables. New-QoS_DP = NewQosVarDatan*10+:10 where n = Address3:0. Address = Remark-Profile.Nwk-Qos-Map(5), QoS_DP(10)

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_REMARK_PROFILE_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Remark Profile Mapping for QOS Var Mapping procedure: mapping 5 bit remark profile to 5 bit value 1 to 1 mapping

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_TTL_PIPE_MAPPING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Pipe Mapped TTL_Variable(8b), mapped by TTL_Idx(5b)

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_TTL_MODEL_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: TTL Model Inheritance PHP configuration

AppDB.Name: QOS_INGRESS_INHERITANCE_RESOLUTION_MPLS_TYPE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: QoS Inheritance MPLS layer type configuration

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_POLICER_OFFSET_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Qos egress policer offset mapping

AppDB.Name: QOS_EGRESS_JR1_FHEI_MODEL_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: FHEI model mapping from JR1 to JR2
